headline: Biopesticides Industry Research and Forecast Report 2021-2031 with Competitive Analysis of Corteva, Syngenta, BASF, Bayer, Koppert Biological Systems, and Certis Biologicals
summary: The Global Biopesticides Market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 11.72%, reaching USD 19.67 Billion by 2031, driven by rising demand for eco-friendly farming. Key trends include integrated pest management and biotech innovations.
